data.text: Anɨb ak chɨn mɨñɨl ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol tek ma yonɨgun, binɨb awl gɨpal okok kɨli takaw nepal tek mɨdɨl, Klays takaw ne nɨg dɨnɨgun. Klays takaw ne ned nɨgɨnok ak nep tepayaŋ agɨl tepayaŋ agɨl ma agɨnɨgayn. Chɨn Klays takaw ned nɨgɨnok ak pel nɨŋɨd lɨl nɨm, kal gɨnɨg mab meg puŋɨl tepayaŋ tɨgjuwɨl, tepayaŋ puŋɨl tepayaŋ puŋɨl gɨpun tek, kal gɨjunɨgun tek ma lup. Takaw anɨb okok apin ak, wog yokɨp gɨpun ak kelɨgɨl, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgɨpun takaw ak. Pen God nop gos lɨnopun takaw ak.

Ñɨg pakñɨbun takaw ak. Ñɨn dɨ mɨdɨlɨg God nop agnopun takaw ak. Binɨb kumɨl tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgabun takaw ak. God binɨb okok kɨlop bɨlok lek, pel pelnep yul awl dɨnɨgabun akaŋ pel pelnep mɨdtep gɨnɨgabun takaw ak. Takaw anɨb okok mɨnek mɨnek ma agɨnɨgun.
Pen God chɨnop Yaw agonɨmuŋ, anɨb ak gɨnɨgabun.

Binɨb ogɨnap, God mɨlek ne kɨlop gek gos pag yɨkɨl, tap teplep God man ne alaŋ nɨb ak dɨl, God Kawnan ne ak agyokek binɨb ogɨnap ayɨp dɨlak. Kɨli God takaw ne ak nɨg dɨl, takaw tep yɨbɨl agɨl gos nɨgɨlak. Pen God kɨles ne dɨl binɨb kɨlop kod yenɨgab ñɨn ak, kɨli kɨles anɨb ak dɨ yelak. Binɨb anɨb okok pen, kɨdek God nop kud ñɨl kelɨgɨl apyap pakɨnɨgabal ak, tɨtay dɨnɨgabal? Kɨli adɨkɨd, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun, kelɨgɨnɨgun agɨl, anɨgɨnɨgel tek ma lup. Kɨli tap tɨmel anɨgɨlak ak, God Ñɨne nop mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lɨlak tek tepayaŋ gɨlak. Anɨgelak, binɨb okok nop mɨseŋ lɨl agjulak.
Man ak pelpel pakɨl, lum mɨgan ayaŋ amub. Pen lum ak gek tap mɨdup jak tep gɨl mɨdup pulek, binɨb wog gɨpal okok ñɨŋɨnɨgabal ak, God lum anɨb ak gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab.
6.8 Stt 3.17-18 Pen nag ñuñu sek mab ñuñu sek okok nep jakɨnɨgab ak, lum tɨmel gɨl kelɨgek pɨsnep sagi dɨnɨgab. God ne anɨgek, kɨdek lum anɨb ak pɨsnep yɨnel kul gɨnɨgab.
Bogɨlak tep yad okok, nɨbop takaw awl tek agobun. Ak pen nɨbop gos nɨŋɨd, anɨgɨl gos nopun, kanɨb tep adek ak kɨdek gɨnɨgabɨm. Kɨdek gem, God nɨbop tɨg asɨk dɨnɨgab.

6.10 Lom 15.25, 2 Ko 8.4, 1 Te 1.3, 2 Te 1.6-7, 2 Ti 1.18, Hib 10.32-34 God ne bɨ tɨmel gep ak mel. Nɨbi binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal okok, kɨlop ned abe mɨñɨl abe gɨñɨl dɨtep gɨpɨm. Anɨgem ne nɨŋɨd nɨgup, nop gos nɨŋɨd mapen lɨl wog tep anɨb ak gɨpɨm. Nɨm ak sawl ma gɨnɨgab.
6.11 Kol 2.2, Hib 3.6, 3.14 Pen chɨnop tep gɨnɨgab ak, nɨbi keke mɨdupsek adek anɨb ak nep gɨ mɨdɨl, amɨl ne ayɨp mɨdtep gɨnɨgun agɨl, pel gos nepɨm tek gɨnɨgab.

6.12 Hib 10.36 Yɨlɨk yɨlɨk gɨnɨmuŋ tek lup ak, nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbi pen bɨ okok kɨli Klays nop gos nɨŋɨd, mɨŋel ogɨnap apek gos anɨb ak ma nɨŋɨd wog ne malɨk gɨl gɨñɨbal ak, kɨli gɨpal tek ak kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb. Anɨgem, God kɨlop dɨtep gɨnɨgayn agak tek gup ak tek, nɨbop abe gɨnɨgab.

Bɨlel God ne Eblaham nop takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak agɨnɨg, bɨawl yad tek olap sek ma yek nɨŋɨd, bɨ ogɨnap yɨb kɨlop ma agak. Yad gɨnɨgayn agebin tek gɨnɨm agɨl, yɨb ne ke agɨl agak, Yad mɨdebin tek, yepɨs ma apin nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agak.
6.14 Stt 22.16-17 Yad nep dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨl gek, ñapay nad tɨke, tɨkel tɨkel amek, kuŋay yɨbɨl yenɨgabal agak.
Anɨb agek, Eblaham God ne gɨnɨgayn agak tek gɨnɨgab agɨl, kɨmɨgel kod yek yek, nop dɨtep gɨnɨgayn agak tek nep gak.

Binɨb takaw kɨles nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agɨnɨg, bɨawl olap yɨb nop agɨl apal, Bɨawl nɨm mɨdeb tek, yepɨs ma apin nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin apal. Anɨgel, binɨb okok nɨŋɨd, ak nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ageb agɨl, takaw penpen apal ak kelɨgɨpal.

6.17 Lom 11.29, Hib 11.9 Bɨlel God ne binɨb okok kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgayn agɨl, kɨlop takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak agek kɨli nɨgɨlak, chɨnop dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab. Pen kɨli takaw anɨb ak nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgel agɨl, ne anɨb agak, Takaw yad apin ak ma kelɨgɨnɨgayn, gos olap kɨdek ma nɨgɨnɨgayn agak. Kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl agɨl agebin, Yad gɨnɨgayn agebin tek gɨnɨm agebin agak.

6.18 Nam 23.19, 1 Sml 15.29, Hib 12.1 Pen mɨñɨl takaw omɨŋal mɨdeb, God ne yepɨs ma apin nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agak ak sek, ne gɨnɨgayn agebin tek gɨnɨm agak ak sek. Takaw omɨŋal anɨb okok tɨg adɨkɨl gɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Pen chɨn nopun, God ne yepɨs agep tek ma lup. Anɨb ak chɨn binɨb pɨlɨkɨl, God yɨl we gɨlɨg opun okok, gos sek yonɨgun. God ne gɨnɨgayn agebin tek gɨnɨm agak ak nɨŋɨd, chɨnop dɨtep gɨnɨgab ak kod mɨdobun.

6.19 Wkp 16.2-3, 16.12, 16.15, Hib 9.7 Chɨnop dɨtep gɨnɨgab ak kod mɨdobun nɨm ak, gos tɨmud nɨbi ak mɨdtep gɨl kɨles gɨnɨmɨb agak tek yonɨgun. Gos tɨmud anɨb ak, sip anka dɨ mɨdebal tek yonɨgun. Pen bɨ chɨnop dɨtep gɨnɨgab ak kod mɨdobun ak, Jisas nokom nɨm. Jisas ne amɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ chech palawl kanɨbtub pɨl gɨlak ak pɨskɨd amɨl, kaw ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ amnak.

6.20 Wkp 16.2-3, 16.12-15, Sng 110.4, Hib 3.1, 5.6, 5.10, 7.17, 8.1, 9.24 Jisas nɨm, ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep Melkisedek ak tek mɨdɨl, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak pel pelnep yenɨgab. Ne God agnɨgep kal awl ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ ned amɨl, chɨnop nen wog gɨñɨlɨg God ayɨp mɨdeb.6.20 Ñɨn nokom olap sap yeb ne kuŋay yɨbɨl, Yislel bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak ne wog awl olap golɨgup. Chag meme bulmakaw pakɨl, nɨkɨm ak dɨl, God nop sɨbog ñolɨgup. Tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, nop sɨbog ñolɨgup. Nɨkɨm dad, God agnɨgep kal awl kaw ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ amolɨgup. Kaw ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ anɨb ak, God ne ke yolɨgup. Buk Wok Pris sapta 16 ayɨp, buk Hiblu sapta 9.1-7 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨm. Pen mɨñɨl Jisas ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak mɨdɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl God man ne alaŋ mɨdeb ak, kaw ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ amub. Mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdɨl, binɨb okok gach kɨlop mɨdupsek tɨg walɨg gɨyokeb. Buk Hiblu sapta 2.17 ayɨp, sapta 4.14 ayɨp, sapta 8.2 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨmɨn.
